site_name: Avon House, Allen Street, LONDON, W8 6BL
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 21/06400 (Demolition of building and redevelopment of site, to provide a ground plus three storey building, including extension of existing basement, additional sub-basement level, for use as a care home facility (Class C2), with landscaping and associated works. (Major Application)) to make alterations to the wording of condition nos.  8 (Flood Risk Assessment/Sustainable Drainage Systems Strategy), 9 (Demolition Environmental Management Plan), 15 (Contamination - Site investigation and quantitative risk assessment), 16 (Contamination - Remediation method statement) and 19 (Contamination - Long term monitoring) to allow the sequence of works to flow unimpeded.
